txt.en: 'Stay back!'
'I shall do what I can to combat this deepening darkness!'
'I don't need this ballista to kill you!'
'Snêsa nyash yê wâtko, yenmë kautai!'
'Wísa twerei auso nyinyë kyausai, shalë shâpai!'
'Traisa nyash shauko savriyë, kawalnyë kâlpa!'
'Karwênya walikë kaya! Kaum snai ksart! Yukâlnyë kerchi orkmô!'
'Rûgha!'
'Matarë kârstai!'
'Tsak shalë yâsar Vaskuchâtak karnai!'
'Misa-ayë shui!'
'Pârmank kwâla!'
'Tsûwai tweyë tsarkai!'
'Srûkalnyë!'
'The cisterns have been secured and our foes routed!'
'Yshiyë shâshvat!'
'Yamorë kâshta aksalai!'
'One of the Enemy's burning projectiles has sprung to life! It must be stopped before its flames engulf the city!'
'The Morgul-troll drummers have been defeated!'
'Swing hard, you lot! Don't let the Orcs think we're holding back!'
'Cut them down! Show them what the Men of Lossarnach are made of!'
'The forces of the Enemy shift below. We must move to aid the other defenders!'
'Don't you worry, Mithrandir! My men and I will handle this on our own!'
'Are we even certain it can be destroyed?'
'Our doom comes, Mithrandir! You must know this!'
'We must repel them before it is too late!'
'The battle turns against us!'
'Forlong! Have you nothing to say?'
'Northern Flank'
<rgb=#FF0000>A band of frenzied Morgul-orcs has reached the wall!</rgb>
'The will of your master holds no power here! Begone!'
'Morgul-troll drummers have arrived on the field! Bring them down before they can incite the Enemy's forces!'
'As the Master wills!'
'If we surrender, we shall be spared!'
'No hope...'
'Death comes for us all...'
'Thank you, friend. I do not know what came over me...'
'Where am I? What has happened?'
'What madness took hold of me?'
'Look above! One of the Enemy's beasts flies low - just out of shot! Do the Nazgûl themselves now come to bring us to ruin?'
'Open the gate?! I would never!'
'Gate-wall'
Hammer of the Underworld - Solo
'The courage of our men is renewed, and the Enemy's grip on their minds is broken!'
'The wall has been reclaimed, and our weapons remain intact!'
'Our scouts have discovered a small force of Morgul-orcs hauling black powder into the cisterns. You must defeat them before they can weaken the foundation of Minas Tirith!'
'The Half-troll has been defeated! The wounded are safe!'
'Fire! It cannot be allowed to breach the gates!'
'It does not catch flame and none of our weapons can damage it!'
'The lines are broken! We must fall back behind the gates!'
'Rohan must come… or all is lost…'
'You're too late, [placeholder]!'
<rgb=#FF0000>A subjugated soldier is making for the gate's mechanisms!</rgb>
'Our numbers grow by the hour! How can you hope to stand against us?'
'Grond will smash your precious gate to pieces!'
'The Enemy has overrun part of the wall! Drive them off before they can wield our weapons against us!'
'Do not surrender, men! This battle can still be won!'
'Hold behind the gates! Hold for dawn!'
'The Enemy's foul sorcery has been undone! Hope shall still triumph!'
'The might of Gondor shall not be broken!'
'Fight at my side, and we shall see their forces broken together!
'Grond is within catapult shot! We must destroy it before it reaches the gates!'
'Southern Flank'
'Does the hammer fall then upon all of Middle-earth?'
'Hope cannot fade! Hold!'
'I do not doubt the strength of the Great Gate, but we must destroy Grond. I will not leave the fate of Gondor to chance.'
'Even Orcs must rest! We must hold!'
'Enough! We have lost many already, but we must hold out long enough to destroy Grond!'
'Stand close, my friends!'
The Witch-king bellows!
'Mithrandir, will you follow me onto the wall? I fear that without your presence, our men may soon fall to despair.'
'I am with you to the very end, friends!'
The Witch-king shrieks!
'Come now, Golasgil! If any among us could answer that for better or worse, I would already be back in one of the taverns!'
'We shall triumph yet!'
The Witch-king wails!
'Do not despair! Hope yet remains!'
The Witch-king screams!
You must have completed the 'The Defence of Minas Tirith' battle in Solo/Duo.
'A brutal Half-troll has climbed into one of the towers and seeks to claim more heads for the Enemy. Make haste to defeat him!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Subjugated soldiers are making for the gate's mechanisms!</rgb>
'Fear has broken our lines! Make haste and rally the men who have thrown down their arms in terror!'
'Light it up, maggot!'
'Your heads are mine!'
'What are you waiting for? Light all of it!'
'Die, weaklings!'
'Thank you! I do not know what came over me!'
'My weapon fell from my hand...'
'My heart is pained, friend. I must rest from battle.'
'I would never have dropped my guard...'
'It was a great labour just to draw breath!'
'The Enemy's living fire has been doused! We can now work to clear the city of flames!'
'Follow me quickly for we have no time left to spare.'
'You stay away!'
'Sauron has revealed his vile design, my friends. We must act against it before the hour is too late!'
'If we can't have it, you can't either!'
'For all his pride, he chose to honour Morgoth - his master of old who once bore the great hammer, Grond.'
'See what happens, [placeholder]?'
'It may or it may not. The fate of Minas Tirith shall decide a great many other things.'
